td.content: s:66 yr old white F tutor presents with moderate weak urinary stream, moderate foamy urine, moderate urinary dribbling and Diabetes for past 4 weeks. pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily she is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 176 cm, Weight 50.1 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glyburide - 5 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
